response.overview: Ben Sanderson, an alcoholic Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his drinking, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.
response.tagline: I Love You... The Way You Are.
response.title: Leaving Las Vegas

titles.title: Leaving Las Vegas - Liebe bis in den Tod

results.name: LEAVING LAS VEGAS (1995) | Cashing the Check at the Bank | MGM
